name: North Pole Jumper
description:
Play as an adorable polar bear getting his favorite tuna fishes while avoiding angry fishes!

North Pole Jumper was made with the spirit of Christmas in mind, bringing joy and laughter following the upcoming season. With comedy, lighthearted, quirky and whimsical as part of the central experience. The game was made with local group sessions in mind, where players take turns to play the game sharing the same machine.

North Pole Jumper is a casual arcade game made in Stencyl Game Jam 17 with a team of 2 consisting of designer/programmer and an artist. The game was made in Stencyl game engine in about 7 days, the theme given was ‘Cold’.

How To Play?
  1. WASD or Num-Pad or Arrow Keys.

Get the tuna fish for points and avoid the red angry fish. Becareful of the falling platforms too~

Credits

Design & Programming: Joshua Yau
Art: Gan ZinJer
Font: Mans Greback, Khrys Bosland from DaFont
Music: Jay Man from OurMusicBox
SFX: LloydEvans09, ProAudioNinja, phmiller42, Denis Chapon, sheepfilms from Freesound.org

Johann Lim and Tan Jim Son for design insight.
Danielle Yau for the idea and critiques.

Made for #StencylJam17 with the theme as 'Cold'. Merry Christmas! Feedback is most welcomed! #arcade
